RevisionHistory.Revision: Updated version w/service attributes, output control

DeviceProperties.ServiceAttributesFormulas:
[{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Auto Mode Control"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 1, Uint16), 1, "Air Quality", 0, "Scheduling", "Error");"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Scheduler Operation Mode"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 5, Uint16),
0, "Stay at home",
1, "Working Week",
2, "Office",
3, "Custom",
"Error"
);"}]
DeviceProperties.ServiceActionsScripts: [{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Scheduler Operation Mode","NumericParameters":[],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[{"FriendlyName":"Scheduler Operation Mode","Abbreviation":"som","Values":[{"Item1":0,"Item2":"Stay at home"},{"Item1":1,"Item2":"Working Week"},{"Item1":2,"Item2":"Office"},{"Item1":3,"Item2":"Custom"}]}]},"Script":"MODBUSW(H, 5, Uint16, som);"}]

DeviceProperties.ServiceAttributesFormulas: [{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Minimum supply air temperature"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 199, Uint16)/10 \u002B \u0022 \u00B0C\u0022;"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Maximum supply air temperature"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 200, Uint16)/10 \u002B \u0022 \u00B0C\u0022;"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Free heating/cooling"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 201, Uint16), 0, \u0022Off\u0022, 1,\u0022On\u0022, \u0022Error\u0022);"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Heating enable denied"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 202, Uint16), 0, \u0022Off\u0022, 1,\u0022On\u0022, \u0022Error\u0022);"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Cooling enable denied"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 203, Uint16), 0, \u0022Off\u0022, 1,\u0022On\u0022, \u0022Error\u0022);"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Constant heat recovery"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 216, Uint16), 0, \u0022Off\u0022, 1,\u0022On\u0022, \u0022Error\u0022);"}]

[{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Current extract flow"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 907, Uint32) \u002B \u0022 m3/h\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Current extract fan intesivity"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 910, Uint16)/10 \u002B \u0022 %\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Extract Pressure"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 919, Uint16) \u002B \u0022 Pa\u0022;"}]

[{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Next Mode"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 6, Uint16),
0,"Standby",
1, "Away",
2, "Normal",
3, "Intensive",
4, "Boost",
5, "Kitchen",
6, "Fireplace",
7, "Override",
8, "Holidays",
"Error"
);"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Next Mode Start Time"},"ReadFormula":"var time:= MODBUSR(H, 7, Uint16);
var hours:= FLOOR(time/60);
var minutes:= MOD(time, 60);
IF(time = 0, RETURN ("Not set"));
RETURN (hours + ":"+ minutes);"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Next Mode Weekday"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 8, Uint16), 
0, "None",
1, "Monday",
2, "Tuesday",
3, "Wednesday",
4, "Thursday",
5, "Friday",
6, "Saturday",
7, "Sunday",
"Error"
);"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Away Supply flow"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 99, Uint32) + " %";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Away Extract flow"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 101, Uint32) + " %";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Away Setpoint"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 103, Int16)/10 + " °C";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Away Heating"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 104, Uint16), 1, "On", 0, "Off", "Error");"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Normal Supply flow"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 105, Uint32) + " %";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Normal Extract flow"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 107, Uint32) + " %";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Normal Setpoint "},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 109, Int16)/10 + " °C";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Normal Heating"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 110, Uint16), 1, "On", 0, "Off", "Error");"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Intensive Supply flow"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 111, Uint32) + " %";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Intensive Extract flow"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 113, Uint32) + " %";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Intensive Setpoint"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 115, Int16)/10 + " °C";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Intensive Heating"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 116, Uint16), 1, "On", 0, "Off", "Error");"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Boost Supply flow"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 117, Uint32) + " %";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Boost Extract flow"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 119, Uint32) + " %";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Boost Setpoint"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 121, Int16)/10 + " °C";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Boost Heating"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 122, Uint16), 1, "On", 0, "Off", "Error");"}]

DeviceProperties.ReadLevel: SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 4, Uint16), 1,MODBUSR(H, 99, Uint32) /100, 2,MODBUSR(H, 105, Uint32) /100, 3,MODBUSR(H, 111, Uint32) /100, 4,MODBUSR(H, 117, Uint32) /100, 0);
